ygData.subject: Re: Re: Tattered Gnomish Cloak
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Combine with what though.. The recipe is not too specific as to how many metal rods to use, and also is bit ambigous as to wether the belt is required
ygData.messageBody:
> I tried it after they put in the tailoring patch for cloaks. Wrong
> cloak. The tailoring cloak comes out as a patchwork and won't
> combine. They could have changed something since though.

Combine with what though.. The recipe is not too specific as to how many metal
rods to use, and also is bit ambigous as to wether the belt is required element,
or just a bit of flavor - I'd be more inclined towards the latte,r as it doesnt
say what sort of belt it was... That's why I suggested the new failed attempt
list..

Also, on a completely unrelated note.. The gnomish metal gauntlets and the silk
lined steel cap that are sold at the vendor at the windmills - has anyone tried
putting them on and seeing what they looked like? I wouldn't mind buying and
wearing that cap if it looked like steel, though the icon makes me think it'll
end up as leather:)
